metadata.title: CVE-2021-41500 on Ubuntu 22.10 (kinetic) - medium.
metadata.description:
Incomplete string comparison vulnerability exits in cvxopt.org cvxop <= 1.2.6 in APIs (cvxopt.cholmod.diag, cvxopt.cholmod.getfactor, cvxopt.cholmod.solve, cvxopt.cholmod.spsolve), which allows attackers to conduct Denial of Service attacks by construct fake Capsule objects.

Update Instructions:

Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2021-41500` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
by updating your system to the following package versions:

python3-cvxopt - 1.2.7+dfsg-2
No subscription required

criterions.comment: cvxopt package in kinetic, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '1.2.7+dfsg-2').
